description: A custom-built backpack modified further to be an archer's best friend.  Lots of storage, manageable encumbrance and a built in quiver.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A suit of Gothic plate armor modified with kevlar and leather, altered to better protect the gaps between plates and provide better protection from the elements.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A medieval steel breastplate, modified with kevlar and leather to better protect from the elements.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A full assembly of medieval arm protection.  Rerebraces, couters, and vambraces, subsequently modified with kevlar and leather to better protect the joints.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A full assembly of medieval leg protection.  Cuisses, poleyns, and greaves, subsequently modified with kevlar and leather to better protect the joints.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A medieval helmet that has been heavily modified, widening the eye slits and breaths, with ballistic lenses and a kevlar aventail helping make up for the increased vulnerability.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

description: A heavy set of medieval gauntlets, modified with kevlar reinforcements to increase protection from the elements.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

description: A heavy set of armor plated boots, modified with kevlar to better protect from the elements.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Experimental reinforced boots that completely silence your steps, but also slow your movement.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str_pl: pair of radiogenic gogglespairs of XL

description: Experimental goggles that use gamma radiation emitters, allowing the user to see through walls and in the dark.  Prolonged use is not recommended due to danger of radiation poisoning.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A fairly light full-body suit of gray ballistic armor, one size fits most, with separate helmet.  Made from a fabric bodysuit with advanced composite plates, it is relatively easy to move in but protection is minimal, only rated for pistol-caliber rounds and fragmentation.  It also has two pouches for various sizes of small and medium magazines.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A full-body suit of gray ballistic armor, one size fits most, with separate helmet.  Made with leather lining and advanced composite plates, it provides adequate protection against anything up to intermediate caliber ammunition, but may fail against full-power rifle rounds.  It also has two pouches for various sizes of small and medium magazines.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A heavy-duty full-body suit of gray ballistic armor, one size fits most, with separate helmet.  Made from heavy-duty lining with advanced plating, it protects the body rather well against most rifle rounds, but may be too cumbersome for most situations.  It also has two pouches for various sizes of medium and large magazines.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A fairly light full-face ballistic helmet, one size fits most.  Made from a fabric lining with advanced composite plates, it is only rated for pistol-caliber rounds and fragmentation.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A full-face ballistic helmet, one size fits most.  Made with leather lining and advanced composite plates, it provides adequate protection against anything up to intermediate caliber ammunition.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A heavy-duty full-face ballistic helmet, one size fits most.  Made from heavy-duty lining with advanced plating, it protects the head rather well against most rifle rounds.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A wide-brimmed hat that's been modified with kevlar padding, and bandolier loops sewn onto the hat band.  Perfect for holding a few cartridges somewhere out of the way, its adjustable loops fitting a wide variety of ammunition.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
